titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 215: Haggadah for Passover

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Incipits in enlarged square characters; text breaks denoted by a sof pasuḳ, plus spaces of varying width; Maggid segment of the Hagaddah; fol. 1 starts שהביא המקום ברוך הוא על המצרים to מלאכי[ם] רעים ארבע אמרו מעתה. Fol. 2, missing 1-3 lines from the top, contains קרבתנו ל]הר סיני] to עוגות מצות כי לא.
Condition: non-consecutive; fol. 1 nearly complete, fol. 2 damaged, losses at top.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msContents.textLang: Hebrew; Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 13; ruling method: left rule is justified by a graphic filler.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
